snippet: The breach caused by Hurricane Sandy allows the ocean to pour into the bay, flushing it with badly needed clean and oxygen-rich water.
abstract: Lawrence Downes The Suburban Life column observes that breach caused by Hurricane Sandy on Fire Island allows ocean to pour into Great South Bay, which has badly needed flushing; warns Long Islanders that closing breach would be rejection of much-needed gift.
lead_paragraph: The breach caused by Hurricane Sandy allows the ocean to pour into the bay, flushing it with badly needed clean and oxygen-rich water.
